channel.title: Major Fucking help
channel.description: Ok i tryed changed the currency and changed everything from 995 to 6529 and then i changed it back cause it didn't work. I logg in and open a store and i get disconnected. What the f is the problem someone help...Please?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 04, 2007, 10:24:13 PM[/size][hr]I will definately somehow make it worth it if u help me with this.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 04, 2007, 10:29:28 PM[/size][hr]Oh wtf? Someone god dangit, i just ran my backup which it wouldn't do crap and it does the same thing!!!!!!!!!!!!! what is going on!

item.title: Major Fucking help
item.dc:creator: @r.v.d.p r.v.d.p
item.description:
@r.v.d.p wrote:

you’re shop isn’t recognised or the npc isn’t tradeable, there are some npc’s which can’t carry shops i don’t know why…

Read full topic

item.title: Major Fucking help
item.dc:creator: @Deviation_Scape Deviation Scape
item.description:
@Deviation_Scape wrote:

Ok see the thing is, my backup. I haven’t updated it in a while, let alone my items in shop.cfg so why would it disconnect me in my backup if i hadn’t even updated it. It would seem like a problem with my moparscape program more than an error in my coding.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 04, 2007, 10:55:33 PM[/size][hr]Hm…Wow i added so much to my server and now im gonna have to restart it totally cause no one don’t know crap about this.[br][size=1]Posted on: June 04, 2007, 11:03:55 PM[/size][hr]Ok i’ve narrowed it down to one of these

Server.java
Player.java
NPCHandler.java
Npc.Cfg
autospawn.cfg
Item.Cfg
Item.java
Item2.java

This is the thing i get on runserver when i try and open a shop

Ok forget the pic this is what it says

java.lang.ArrayInfexOutOfBoundsException: -106
at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:16830)
at client.parseProcess(client.java:15462)
at client.process(client.java:15432)
at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:137)
at server.main(server.java:47)
pimpscape Server [fata]] - exception

And just to tell everyone, before i this happened i was trying to change currency and that didn’t work so maybe i just messed something up with using gp instead of the currency i was changed it to, idk??!

Read full topic
